thread.title: Sania Mirza-Martina Hingis cruise into China Open quarters
thread.title_full: Sania Mirza-Martina Hingis cruise into China Open quarters | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Sania Mirza-Martina Hingis cruise into China Open quarters
text:
Other Articles Atletico de Kolkata beat FC Goa 1-0 in ISL India thrash New Zealand 3-1 to level Hockey Test series Baseball: Young Astros soar high with first playoff success Indian tennis ace Sania Mirza and her Swiss partner Martina Hingis continued their sublime form as they progressed through to the China Open quarterfinals in the doubles event on Wednesday.
The top seeded Indo-Swiss pair returned brilliantly after their first set defeat to claim a 1-6, 6-4, 10-6 win over Sara Errani and Flavia Pennetta in a thrilling second round contest that lasted an hour and 16 minutes.
Mirza and Hingis, who had recently lifted the womenâ€™s doubles title at Wuhan Open, will next face Julia Goerges and Karolina Pliskova.
First Published on October 07, 2015 8:08 pm
